languages.text: Вдвоем пробирались Домин и Вени наверх сквозь искаженный остов корабля. Из стылых катакомб нижних палуб поднялись они в пламенные недра корабельного крематория. Языки огня лизали их, но не опаляли. Навстречу же им маршировали колонны мертвецов, чтобы в пламени обратиться во прах. Домин же и Вени шли им навстречу.

Together, the Domin and the Veni made their way up through the malformed frame of the ship. From the cold catacombs of the lower decks, they travelled up into the fires of the ship's crematorium. Tongues of flame licked at them, yet they did not burn. Columns of the dead marched toward them to be turned to ash in the fire, and the Domin and the Veni walked toward the dead in turn.
languages.original_text: Вдвоем пробирались Домин и Вени наверх сквозь искаженный остов корабля. Из стылых катакомб нижних палуб поднялись они в пламенные недра корабельного крематория. Языки огня лизали их, но не опаляли. Навстречу же им маршировали колонны мертвецов, чтобы в пламени обратиться во прах. Домин же и Вени шли им навстречу.

traits.locale_text: Together, the Enim and the Oa made their way up through the mangled frame of the ship. From the cold catacombs of the lower decks, they went up into the fiery depths of the ship's crematorium. Tongues of flame licked them, yet did not burn them. Columns of the dead were marching toward them, to be turned to ash in the fire. The Enim and the Oa, too, walked toward the dead.

Together, the Enim and the Oa made their way up through the mangled frame of the ship. From the cold catacombs of the lower decks, they went up into the fiery depths of the ship's crematorium. Tongues of flame licked them, yet did not burn them. Columns of the dead were marching toward them, to be turned to ash in the fire. The Enim and the Oa, too, walked toward the dead.

Tongues of flame licked at them, yet they did not burn. Columns of the dead marched toward them to be turned to ash in the fire, and the Enim and the Oa walked toward the dead in turn.

Tongues of flame licked at them, yet they did not burn. Columns of the dead marched toward them to be turned to ash in the fire, and the Enim and the Oa walked toward the dead in turn.

Together, the Domin and the Veni made their way up through the malformed frame of the ship. From the cold catacombs of the lower decks, they travelled up into the fires of the ship's crematorium. Tongues of flame licked at them, yet they did not burn. Columns of the dead marched toward them to be turned to ash in the fire, and the Domin and the Veni walked toward the dead in turn.

Together, the Domin and the Veni made their way up through the malformed frame of the ship. From the cold catacombs of the lower decks, they travelled up into the fires of the ship's crematorium. Tongues of flame licked at them, yet they did not burn. Columns of the dead marched toward them to be turned to ash in the fire, and the Domin and the Veni walked toward the dead in turn.

languages.text: Gemeinsam bahnten sich {mf|der|die} Domin und der Veni einen Weg durch das verformte Gerippe des Schiffs. Von den kalten Katakomben der Unterdecks reisten sie hinauf in die Feuer des Schiffskrematoriums. Flammen züngelten an ihnen, doch sie verbrannten nicht. Kolonnen der Toten marschierten auf sie zu, um im Feuer zu Asche verwandelt zu werden, und {mf|der|die} Domin und der Veni schritten ihrerseits auf die Toten zu.
languages.original_text: Together, the Domin and the Veni made their way up through the malformed frame of the ship. From the cold catacombs of the lower decks, they travelled up into the fires of the ship's crematorium. Tongues of flame licked at them, yet they did not burn. Columns of the dead marched toward them to be turned to ash in the fire, and the Domin and the Veni walked toward the dead in turn.

traits.locale_text: Gemeinsam bahnten sich {mf|der|die} Domin und der Veni einen Weg durch das verformte Gerippe des Schiffs. Von den kalten Katakomben der Unterdecks reisten sie hinauf in die Feuer des Schiffskrematoriums. Flammen züngelten an ihnen, doch sie verbrannten nicht. Kolonnen der Toten marschierten auf sie zu, um im Feuer zu Asche verwandelt zu werden, und {mf|der|die} Domin und der Veni schritten ihrerseits auf die Toten zu.

languages.text: Juntos, el Veni y {mf|el|la} Domin se abrieron paso por los deformes restos de la nave. Desde las frías catacumbas de las cubiertas inferiores pasaron a las llamas del crematorio. Lenguas de fuego les lamían sin quemar. Largas filas de muertos se dirigían hacia ellas para convertirse en ceniza con el fuego, y el Veni y {mf|el|la} Domin se dirigieron hacia los muertos.
languages.original_text: Together, the Domin and the Veni made their way up through the malformed frame of the ship. From the cold catacombs of the lower decks, they travelled up into the fires of the ship's crematorium. Tongues of flame licked at them, yet they did not burn. Columns of the dead marched toward them to be turned to ash in the fire, and the Domin and the Veni walked toward the dead in turn.

traits.locale_text: Juntos, el Veni y {mf|el|la} Domin se abrieron paso por los deformes restos de la nave. Desde las frías catacumbas de las cubiertas inferiores pasaron a las llamas del crematorio. Lenguas de fuego les lamían sin quemar. Largas filas de muertos se dirigían hacia ellas para convertirse en ceniza con el fuego, y el Veni y {mf|el|la} Domin se dirigieron hacia los muertos.

languages.text: ドミンとヴェニは共に、変形した船の骨組みの中を進んでいった。下層デッキの冷たい地下墓地から、船の火葬場の炎の中へと入っていった。炎の下が彼らを舐めたが、燃えることはなかった。死者の列は炎へと更新する。火の中で灰になるために。そしてドミンとヴェニは、死に向かって順番に足を進める。
languages.original_text: Together, the Domin and the Veni made their way up through the malformed frame of the ship. From the cold catacombs of the lower decks, they travelled up into the fires of the ship's crematorium. Tongues of flame licked at them, yet they did not burn. Columns of the dead marched toward them to be turned to ash in the fire, and the Domin and the Veni walked toward the dead in turn.

traits.locale_text: ドミンとヴェニは共に、変形した船の骨組みの中を進んでいった。下層デッキの冷たい地下墓地から、船の火葬場の炎の中へと入っていった。炎の下が彼らを舐めたが、燃えることはなかった。死者の列は炎へと更新する。火の中で灰になるために。そしてドミンとヴェニは、死に向かって順番に足を進める。

languages.text: 秘者与帷者一同穿过飞船变了形的舰体。他们从底层甲板冰冷的地下墓穴中走了出来，踏入了火葬场的烈焰之中。火舌舔舐着他们，但他们却并没有燃烧。无数死者排成纵队走向他们，在烈焰中灰飞烟灭，而秘者与帷者朝那些死者走了过去。
languages.original_text: Together, the Domin and the Veni made their way up through the malformed frame of the ship. From the cold catacombs of the lower decks, they travelled up into the fires of the ship's crematorium. Tongues of flame licked at them, yet they did not burn. Columns of the dead marched toward them to be turned to ash in the fire, and the Domin and the Veni walked toward the dead in turn.

traits.locale_text: 秘者与帷者一同穿过飞船变了形的舰体。他们从底层甲板冰冷的地下墓穴中走了出来，踏入了火葬场的烈焰之中。火舌舔舐着他们，但他们却并没有燃烧。无数死者排成纵队走向他们，在烈焰中灰飞烟灭，而秘者与帷者朝那些死者走了过去。

languages.text: Ensemble, {mf|le|la} Domin et le Veni se frayèrent un chemin à travers la structure difforme du vaisseau. Des froides catacombes des ponts inférieurs, ils voyagèrent jusqu'aux feux du crématorium du navire. Malgré les langues de feu qui venaient les lécher, ils ne brûlaient pas. Des colonnes de morts marchaient vers eux pour être réduites en cendres, et {mf|le|la} Domin et le Veni marchaient vers les morts à leur tour.
languages.original_text: Together, the Domin and the Veni made their way up through the malformed frame of the ship. From the cold catacombs of the lower decks, they travelled up into the fires of the ship's crematorium. Tongues of flame licked at them, yet they did not burn. Columns of the dead marched toward them to be turned to ash in the fire, and the Domin and the Veni walked toward the dead in turn.

traits.locale_text: Ensemble, {mf|le|la} Domin et le Veni se frayèrent un chemin à travers la structure difforme du vaisseau. Des froides catacombes des ponts inférieurs, ils voyagèrent jusqu'aux feux du crématorium du navire. Malgré les langues de feu qui venaient les lécher, ils ne brûlaient pas. Des colonnes de morts marchaient vers eux pour être réduites en cendres, et {mf|le|la} Domin et le Veni marchaient vers les morts à leur tour.

languages.text: Domin ve Veni, geminin eğrilip bükülmüş gövdesi boyunca ilerleyerek birlikte yukarı çıkmayı başardı. Alt güvertelerin buz gibi mezarlarından gemi krematoryumunun alevlerine dek yolculuk ettiler. Alevlerin kavurucu öpücüklerine boğulsalar bile yanmadılar. Ölü kortejleri üstlerine yürüdüyse de nihayetleri, alevlerin içinde biten küller olmaktı. Böylece Domin ve Veni, ölülere doğru yürüdü.
languages.original_text: Together, the Domin and the Veni made their way up through the malformed frame of the ship. From the cold catacombs of the lower decks, they travelled up into the fires of the ship's crematorium. Tongues of flame licked at them, yet they did not burn. Columns of the dead marched toward them to be turned to ash in the fire, and the Domin and the Veni walked toward the dead in turn.
